ebay_products.why: Massively trending — Gen Z nostalgia driving huge demand
ebay_products.tip: Charity shops, car boots — source cheap, photograph well

ebay_products.why: Consistent high demand on eBay UK — easy to describe
ebay_products.tip: Test before listing, describe battery life honestly

ebay_products.why: Retro gaming is evergreen and prices are rising yearly
ebay_products.tip: Bundles sell faster than singles — bundle controller + game

ebay_products.why: People replace parts not products — steady demand
ebay_products.tip: Source from clearance sections, include model number in title

ebay_products.why: Nike sneakers #1 consistent eBay UK seller — huge market
ebay_products.tip: Clean before photos. Measure actual size. Hype styles >3x retail

ebay_products.why: Low competition, easy to list, decent margins

fiverr_gigs.title: Fix WordPress Bugs & Errors
fiverr_gigs.why: 40% of internet runs WordPress — always breaking, always need fixing
fiverr_gigs.quick_start: Offer: 'I'll fix any WordPress bug in 24 hours' — low price to get reviews first

fiverr_gigs.title: eBay Listing Optimisation (SEO titles, item specifics)
fiverr_gigs.why: Most eBay sellers don't know Cassini SEO — huge gap
fiverr_gigs.quick_start: Offer 5 listings as a starter package at £25

fiverr_gigs.title: Set Up OpenClaw / AI Agent Automation
fiverr_gigs.why: OpenClaw is new — almost no one on Fiverr knows it yet. First mover advantage.
fiverr_gigs.match: Perfect — run it daily, know it inside out
fiverr_gigs.quick_start: Offer setup + config + Telegram connection as a package

fiverr_gigs.title: WordPress Website Speed Optimisation
fiverr_gigs.why: Core Web Vitals are now a Google ranking factor — businesses panic over this
fiverr_gigs.quick_start: Use GT Metrix report as before/after proof

fiverr_gigs.title: AI Prompt Engineering & ChatGPT Setup
fiverr_gigs.why: Businesses want AI but don't know how to prompt it properly
fiverr_gigs.match: Strong — daily AI usage across multiple tools
fiverr_gigs.quick_start: Offer custom ChatGPT system prompt + 3 use cases for £20
